tool_description:
The Unofficial Divine Douay-Rheims Catholic Bible API

Welcome to the Unofficial Divine Douay-Rheims Catholic Bible API, your gateway to the sacred scriptures of the Catholic faith. This user-friendly API empowers you to access chapters and verses from both the Old and New Testaments of the Douay-Rheims Version, a translation deeply cherished by Catholics worldwide for its fidelity to the original Latin Vulgate.

Immerse yourself in the richness of the Douay-Rheims Bible, the preferred transl...
name: Catholic Bible
title: Catholic Bible

api_list.name: GetVersesByBook
api_list.description: Returns selected verses from a specific book.

api_list.name: GetChapter
api_list.description: Returns a specific chapter of the Bible

api_list.name: GetBooks
api_list.description: Returns all Old and New Testament books.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://catholic-bible.p.rapidapi.com/bible/books"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "catholic-bible.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://catholic-bible.p.rapidapi.com/bible/books"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "catholic-bible.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
